welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Watertown Town, where the charm of New England meets the hustle and bustle of city life. Get ready to discover our historic architecture, lively community, and delicious local cuisine. Enjoy your stay and explore all that our charming city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A modern terminal with 3 concourses, serving mostly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newly renovated terminal with 4 concourses, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: The international terminal at Logan International Airport, with 4 concourses and a US Customs and Border Protection facility.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hanscom Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lawrence Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.
